references.paper_title: Offline reinforcement learning: Tutorial, review, and perspectives on open problems
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of offline RL, the core topic of the current research, making it highly relevant and foundational.

references.paper_title: D4RL: Datasets for deep data-driven reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces D4RL, a benchmark dataset used extensively in the experiments; the quality of the results depends directly on the dataset.
This paper introduces dynamic programming which is a foundational concept in reinforcement learning and is fundamental to understanding offline RL algorithms.
This is a standard textbook in reinforcement learning, providing essential background and context for the core ideas discussed in the present work.

references.paper_title: Efficient training of artificial neural networks for autonomous navigation
references.reason: This paper introduces behavioral cloning, a core technique used in the proposed method; understanding its strengths and limitations is key to understanding the current work.
